title: [Sponsor] The All-Star Mac Bundle Featuring Parallels Pro
content:
The All-Star Mac Bundle Featuring Parallels Pro is a must-have for getting the most out of your computer.

It features five award-winning macOS apps for $35 with code: ALLSTARMAC, including the one used by over 7 million people to run Windows software on their Macs: Parallels. You’ll score a year’s subscription to the latest version, plus lifetime access to FastestVPN, BusyContacts, Moho Debut animation software, and PDFChef.

When you’re looking for a powerful way to manage your contacts, set up your security, or just have a better functioning machine, these apps will make your Mac unstoppable! Get it now!

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
